column4: i downloaded the new ubuntu 12.04 from ubuntus website, my hardware is basic, single core, 2gigs of ram. 2.2 ghz. i still believe it should boot properly. whats odd is as i shut windows down at the blank screen i saw a flash of the operations system which let me to believe its a possible bios issue
you did a normal install? or are you using Wubi?
i used the windows installer and the ubuntu iso from ubuntu's website
